outline:
1. to be or become far, be or become distant, be removed, go far away
    1. (Qal) to be far, be distant
    2. (Piel) to send far away, extend
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to make or exhibit distance, be gone far
      2. to remove, put far away
    4. (Niphal) loose
    5. at a distance
kjv_def: (a-, be, cast, drive, get, go, keep (self), put, remove, be too, (wander), withdraw) far (away, off), loose, [idiom] refrain, very, (be) a good way (off).
strongs_def: to widen (in any direction), i.e. (intransitively) recede or (transitively) remove (literally or figuratively, of place or relation)
